00019 //   ISynth
00020 //---------------------------------------------------------
00021 
00022 ISynth::ISynth()
00023       {
00024       _fluidsynth = 0;
00025       sfont = 0;
00026       fontId = -1;
00027       }
00028 
00029 //---------------------------------------------------------
00030 //   init
00031 //    return true on error
00032 //---------------------------------------------------------
00033 
00034 bool ISynth::init(int sampleRate)
00035       {
00036       fluid_settings_t* settings = new_fluid_settings();
00037       fluid_settings_setnum(settings, "synth.sample-rate", float(sampleRate));
00038 
00039       _fluidsynth = new_fluid_synth(settings);
00040 
00041       const char* p = getenv("DEFAULT_SOUNDFONT");
00042       if (!preferences.soundFont.isEmpty())
00043             p = preferences.soundFont.latin1();
00044       else
00045             p = getenv("DEFAULT_SOUNDFONT");
00046       if (p == 0) {
00047             fprintf(stderr, "Synth: no soundfont specified\n");
00048             return true;
00049             }
00050       return loadSoundFont(p);
00051       }
00052 
00053 //---------------------------------------------------------
00054 //   loadSoundFont
00055 //    return true on error;
00056 //---------------------------------------------------------
00057 
00058 bool ISynth::loadSoundFont(const char* p)
00059       {
00060       if (fontId != -1)
00061             fluid_synth_sfunload(_fluidsynth, fontId, true);
00062       sfont = new char[strlen(p)+1];
00063       strcpy(sfont, p);
00064       fontId = fluid_synth_sfload(_fluidsynth, sfont, true);
00065       if (fontId == -1) {
00066             fprintf(stderr, "ISynth: %s", fluid_synth_error(_fluidsynth));
00067             return true;
00068             }
00069       fluid_synth_set_gain(_fluidsynth, 1.0);
00070       return false;
00071       }
00072 
00073 //---------------------------------------------------------
00074 //   process
00075 //---------------------------------------------------------
00076 
00077 void ISynth::process(unsigned n, float* l, float* r)
00078       {
00079       fluid_synth_write_float(_fluidsynth, n, l, 0, 1, r, 0, 1);
00080       }
00081 
00082 //---------------------------------------------------------
00083 //   playNote
00084 //---------------------------------------------------------
00085 
00086 void ISynth::playNote(int channel, int pitch, int velo)
00087       {
00088 //      printf("note %d %d %d\n", channel, pitch, velo);
00089 
00090       int err;
00091       if (velo) {
00092             err = fluid_synth_noteon(_fluidsynth, channel, pitch, velo);
00093             if (err)
00094                   fprintf(stderr, "FluidSynth: error %d note on, ch %d pitch %d velo %d\n",
00095                      err, channel, pitch, velo);
00096             }
00097       else {
00098             err = fluid_synth_noteoff(_fluidsynth, channel, pitch);
00099             if (err)
00100                   fprintf(stderr, "FluidSynth: error %d note off, ch %d pitch %d\n",
00101                      err, channel, pitch);
00102             }
00103       }
00104 
00105 //---------------------------------------------------------
00106 //   setController
00107 //    return true if busy
00108 //---------------------------------------------------------
00109 
00110 bool ISynth::setController(int ch, int ctrl, int val)
00111       {
00112       switch(ctrl) {
00113             case CTRL_PROGRAM:
00114                   {
00115                   int hbank = (val & 0xff0000) >> 16;
00116                   int lbank = (val & 0xff00) >> 8;
00117                   if (hbank > 127)  // map "dont care" to 0
00118                         hbank = 0;
00119                   if (lbank > 127)
00120                         lbank = 0;
00121                   if (lbank == 127 || ch == 9)       // drum HACK
00122                         lbank = 128;
00123                   int prog  = val & 0x7f;
00124                   fluid_synth_program_select(_fluidsynth, ch,
00125                       fontId, lbank, prog+1);
00126                   }
00127                   break;
00128 
00129             case CTRL_PITCH:
00130                   fluid_synth_pitch_bend (_fluidsynth, ch, val);
00131                   break;
00132 
00133             default:
00134                   fluid_synth_cc(_fluidsynth, ch, ctrl & 0x3fff, val);
00135                   break;
00136             }
00137       return false;
00138       }
